description:
Application for non-material amendment of planning permission PP/2015/1727 for removal of existing entrance feature, remodelling of elevations and construction of 2 additional floors of accommodation and change of use from offices (Use class B1a) to residential units(55units)  (Use class C3) at crystal house; demolition of existing atrium and construction of new entrance and replacement circulation space for international house; replacement canopies; creation of new landscaping; relocation of statue, flexible retail/market/exhibition/event space, display screen and new shop fronts to town square and new shop fronts and creation of children's play space adjacent to the southern entrance. 

Amendments involve minor design changes - above the EBC entrance; to shopfronts; signage zones; residential layouts, balconies, residential windows;  landscaping/amenity Space and the location of the residential cycle parking

The Amendments also result in consequential changes to Conditions 2, 6, 8, 9 and the removal of Condition 11.
decision_conditions: The amended development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Cover letter dated 11/07/2016; Design Addendum Document dated 29/06/16; Drawings numbered: 13991-1000G - Site and location plan; 13991-1021E - Crystal House - Proposed ground floor plan; 13991-1022J - Crystal House - Proposed first floor plan; 13991-1023F - Crystal House - Proposed second floor plan; 13991-1024F - Crystal House - Proposed third floor plan; 13991-1025F - Crystal House - Proposed fourth floor plan; 13991-1026F - Crystal House - Proposed fifth floor plan; 13991-1027E - Crystal House - Proposed sixth floor plan; 13991-1028C - Crystal House - Proposed basement plan; 13991-1029B - Crystal House - Proposed roof level plan; 13991-1041E - Crystal House - Proposed front (Northern) elevation; 13991-1042H - Crystal House - Proposed rear (Southern) elevation; 13991-1043E - Crystal House - Proposed side (Eastern) elevation; 13991-1044C - Crystal House - Northern carpark elevation; 13991-1045C - Crystal House - Proposed side (Western) elevation; 13991-1061F - Crystal House - Proposed section A-A; 13991-1062D - Crystal House - Proposed section B-B; 14049-441C St Saviour's additional cycle parking; OX5217-100-00 - General Arrangement Plan; OX5217-400-00 - General Arrangement Planting Plan.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
